content.value:
Happy 1 year anniversary of sheltering in place!

...many, many, many frozen dino nuggets (with BBQ sauce) and ZERO haircuts later.
content.html: Happy 1 year anniversary of sheltering in place! ...many, many, many frozen dino nuggets (with BBQ sauce) and ZERO haircuts later.

photo.alt: Two side by side photos of me in my kitchen in front of an open dishes cabinet, holding up a huge bottle of Sweet Baby Ray's BBQ sauce, one with my hair quite short (above my shoulder) and lots of BBQ sauce still in the bottle, and the other with my hair quite long (past my shoulder) and almost empty BBQ sauce bottle.
